alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dale, southeastern Coffee and central Geneva Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Enterprise, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Hartford, Level Plains, Slocomb, New Brockton, Clayhatchee, Coffee Springs, Black, Chancellor, Kellys Crossroads, Lucile, Gerald, Central City, Geneva Municipal A/P, Hendrix Crossroad, Cairns Aaf and Enterprise Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
